title: Course Overview
content: The purpose of this training program is to help familiarize you with the essential information needed so you can do your part in maintaining a harassment-and discrimination-free workplace
This course covers four main topics:
transcriptText:
The purpose of this training program is to help familiarize you with the essential information needed so you can do your part in maintaining a harassment- and discrimination-free workplace.

This course covers four main topics;

Workplace Harassment, Workplace Discrimination, Reporting Harassment and Workplace Diversity.

When you have completed this course, you must take and pass a knowledge test.

ccText.text: Hello, and welcome to the Privacy Overview module.
When it comes to patient information it is especially important that we understand the regulations and guidelines so we can protect patient privacy.
Explain the need for standardization in the secure chip industry.
Describe how GlobalPlatform provides solutions to facilitate secure chip acceptance.
Build a root of trust using a GlobalPlatform device.
Choose the best management model according to your ecosystem.
